buffs.description: [Tribe Fortification], is applied even when Elementalist is in Time Shop, and can be increased up to 250 for elf units.
buffs.name: Tribe Fortification (Elf and Human)

buffs.description: Increases nature resistance by 75 for each Elementalist, and 150 nature resistance for each Senior Elementalist. Also increases max nature resistance through Elementalists from 2,000 to 4,000.
buffs.name: Nature Resistance
